game.name: Elf Cleaner
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You're an invisible elf who enjoys secretly making the world a better place. Clean out spaces quickly and efficiently, and create warm homes for lost critters. Repair a broken world while no one is watching.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You're an invisible elf who enjoys secretly making the world a better place. Clean out spaces quickly and efficiently, and create warm homes for lost critters. Repair a broken world while no one is watching.
